page.title: 03Housing
page.content: {Housing}in our area Most of the children at{Glyncollen} school live in recently built "Wimpey" houses.Children at{Ynystawe}school live in a variety of houses .Some are Victorian terraced houses or Edwardian villas,others are modern detached or semi-detached houses or relatively new bungalows. Many Morriston houses were condemned in the 1930's and {Cwmrhydyceirw}was chosen as the site of a housing estate which rehoused those in need. The M4 interchange at Ynysforgan is very useful for commuters,and as a result housing is taking up more space than ever before:this is probably one of the fastest growing areas in Swansea as far as housing is concerned.
